EmailForm.title: Subscribe to our news letter to get latest updates and news

Introduction.title: Introduction
Introduction.content: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you about how we look after your personal data when you visit our website, use our services, and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.

InfoWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
InfoWeCollect.content: We may collect, use, store, and transfer different kinds of personal data about you including, but not limited to:
list: Identity Data: Includes first name, last name, username, or similar identifier.
Contact Data: Email address and phone numbers.
Technical Data: Internet protocol (IP) address, browser type and version, time zone setting, browser plug-in types, operating system, and platform.

DataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
DataUsage.content: We will only use your personal data when the law allows us to. Most commonly, we will use your data in the following circumstances:
list: To provide and maintain our services.
To notify you about changes to our services.
To monitor the usage of our service.
To detect, prevent, and address technical issues.

DataRetention.title: Data Retention
DataRetention.content: We will only retain your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes we collected it for, including for the purposes of satisfying any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.

SharingYourData.title: Sharing Your Data
SharingYourData.content: We do not share your personal data with third parties except in the following circumstances:
list: When we are required to comply with a legal obligation.
When we need to protect our rights or the rights of others.
With service providers who perform functions on our behalf, such as hosting services or payment processing.

Contact.title: Let’s Start a Conversation
Contact.content: We're here to help you with any questions or inquiries you may have. Reach out to us, and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.
